name: Asleep - Global Game Jam 2019 - Team Nefarious
name_original: Asleep - Global Game Jam 2019 - Team Nefarious
description:
A short video game made during the 2019 Global Game Jam by Team Nefarious.

Gameplay:
This little human need sleep.
Let it sleep.

Diversifier:
13. In Ink 17. Scale with a song
